name: mcp-pdf-server
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for PDF text extraction operations
long_description: An MCP server that provides PDF text extraction capabilities. This server allows AI assistants to read and extract text content from PDF files within allowed directories, restricted to configured paths for security. It is built using Node.js and TypeScript, leveraging the Model Context Protocol SDK and the unpdf library for PDF processing.

tools.description: Extract text content from PDF files

tools.description: List directories accessible to the PDF server
